game.name: Birthday Train
game.description:
Today is your friend birthday and you want to surprise her with an amazing gift. For a minute, you might be surrounded by a lot of confusion what you should do to please her. Then you immediately realize that your mother used to make a delicious dessert when you were little. Yes, we are talking about an ultimate train cake, which will be enough to make her feel happy on her special day. In this brand new cooking game called Birthday Train, you will be instructed properly to prepare the most amazing recipe you have ever tried. 

You are best advised to follow all the steps one-by-one to achieve the goal of this free online cooking game. Do your best and show the amazing result to all your friends, who will admire your best cooking skills after tasting the recipe. Hope your efforts will go in the right direction to prepare the mouth-watering birthday train cake. It is easy and simple to please her best friend. Begin this cool recipe by mixing red food coloring, flour, milk, eggs, a pinch of salt, sugar and whipped cream. 

Take a rounded pan and put this mixture into it. Now place it on a tray that is full of water. Then Put them all in the oven and leave it for a while to be baked properly. Take them out if you find your cake very soft and delicate. Use the chocolate cream then to frost it once it becomes ready. Collect a train and start decorating your cake with it. Collect some pink musk sticks and put them around your delicious cake to create the train tracks. Use the colourful sugar coated candy to create the rest of the train. Hope you will get a success in impressing your friend on her birthday!
